channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- FS Product Inquiry
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- FS Product Inquiry

item.title: CVE-2024-4856|2024-06-04T06:00:03.200Z -- Unknown -- FS Product Inquiry
item.description: The FS Product Inquiry WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin or unauthenticated users

item.title: CVE-2024-4857|2024-06-04T06:00:03.389Z -- Unknown -- FS Product Inquiry
item.description: The FS Product Inquiry WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 does not sanitise and escape some form submissions, which could allow unauthenticated users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
